title: Riding Alone for Thousands of Miles (Yimou Zhang)
description:
Director Yimou Zhang&#039;s latest film.

A Japanese father travels to China&#039;s Yunnan province in the place of his ailing son to film a famous folk-opera star.

Source: DVD-9 (Hong Kong version)
